column1: #text=Last year I had to go to my native place in India .
#text=While I was there , I thought of meeting one of my friends in Chennai .
#text=Chennai is 800 kms far away from my place and it takes about 15 hours if I drive .
#text=The economy tickets were sold out so I had to book the expensive one .
#text=On the day of the travel , I arrived at the train station almost an hour before the actual departure time .
#text=Since it was a first class ticket , I could take more than enough luggage with me .
#text=After 15 minutes in to the journey , the ticket collector came by and checked my tickets .
#text=It was early in the morning and I was in a window seat .
#text=So I could watch all the scenery .
#text=Another good thing about the train is that once in a while I could get up and walk a stretch .
#text=Also , when I 'm hungry , I could get down at the station and buy any food as the train stops at the station for 10-15 minutes .
